title: FS: Six Card Raw T206 Lot - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: Six Card Raw T206 Lot - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
See scans below.  Asking $80 delivered; paypal preferred.  Note that the Howell card has some kind of shellack applied to the front; also note that Byrne and McCormick do each have a small/light crease.  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Bobby Byrne (SC350-25) - tiny crease right border at bat
Harry Howell (Portrait) (P350) - shellacked front?
Jack Knight (With Bat) (SC350-30)
Moose McCormick (SC350-30) - light horizontal crease from right border through hat
Jake Pfeister (Seated) (SC350-30)
Kaiser Wilhelm (Hands At Chest) (SC150-649 OP)
